projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Built a website called weather app using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Weather data is retrieved from the weather API, and the Weather App displays the information to the user. This can include the current weather conditions , temperature,wind speed, and any additional details like humidity or precipitation chances.The Weather App allows users to input their desired location or search for a specific city.

projects.title: Candy Crush Game
projects.description: Developed a Candy Crush game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.Designed a logic to crush candies when you find all three candies are the same in a row or in a column,for each crush score increases by 30 points. The game keeps track of the player's score.Set up an audio file of Candy Crush that is auto-playing and plays in a loop. Used DataStructures and algorithms to build the game.

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.description: Bulit a clone of amazon.com using HTML, and CSS.Organized elements such as headers, footers, navigation menus, and product listings using HTML tags and replicated the visual design of Amazon by using CSS to style HTML elements.Explored techniques for styling typography, colors, backgrounds, borders,and layouts to achieve a similar look and feel to the original site
